title: Web Design Proposal through email?
content:
Has anyone proposed to businesses through email a website redesign? I'm trying to pick up some more freelance business and am wondering what information should be included in an email, since it is a somewhat informal way to offer your services.

Thanks all.
author: sorrentinog4

comments.content:
You can use email, but you have to be an exceptional writer, and furthermore you have to somehow figure out what the prospective client _really_ wants, possibly without even realizing it until you tell him. Otherwise the fact that sending an email is so easy will kill your chances.

hhp
